text:
@pritipatel @jt1656 Words are cheap.......time to do your job & take action!
You are letting everyone down with your inaction, please do something to stop these riots - we all now await the spike in #Covid19 infections/deaths as a result of allowing people to congregate in such vast numbers!

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
